messages.title: My vow is to make Scotland stronger at Westminster.
messages.content: The more seats the SNP wins the more influence and power the people of Scotland will have.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Much-needed cash for public services, not wasting Â£100 billion on new nuclear weapons.
Its budget protected and its future safe in public hands.
With better pensions and ongoing benefits such as free bus travel and free personal care.
One which boosts long-term growth, creates jobs and delivers for all.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Free education and the living wage
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fresh thinking and new ideas for Westminster, and be the guarantors of progressive policies like free education and the living wage.

issues.economy: A more responsible economic policy, which boosts long-term growth, creates jobs and delivers for all.
issues.education: Be the guarantors of progressive policies like free education.
issues.health: Additional investment in Scotland's NHS - its budget protected and its future safe in public hands.
issues.socialWelfare: Security in retirement, with better pensions and ongoing benefits such as free bus travel and free personal care.

leaflet.personalStatement: We will play a constructive role with new ideas and fresh thinking.

images.caption: Nicola Sturgeon with text: My vow is to make Scotland stronger at Westminster.
Nicola Sturgeon beside a written statement: We will play a constructive role with new ideas and fresh thinking.
